metadata.title: Snug | A New Housing Solution for Foreigners in Korea
metadata.description: Not just a place to stay in Korea, but a home that becomes part of your life.

hero.subtitle: Discover comfortable and affordable rooms for foreigners

reservations.title: Reservations
reservations.subtitle: Check your upcoming and past stays.
reservations.noCurrentStayDesc: Once you complete your agreement application the status for your booking will be "Pending" until the host responds.
reservations.noPastStaysDesc: Your previous stays will be shown here once completed.
reservations.noCanceledBookingsDesc: Your canceled bookings will appear here if any.
reservations.helpAndSupportDesc: We're here to support you every step of the way.
reservations.refundPolicy15Days: More than 15 days before check-in: 90% refund of rent and contract fee
reservations.refundPolicy14to8Days: 14-8 days before check-in: 70% refund of rent and contract fee
reservations.refundPolicy7to1Days: 7-1 days before check-in: 50% refund of rent and contract fee
reservations.refundPolicyCheckInDay: On the check-in date: No refund
reservations.refundNote1: For same-day cancellations, 10% of the rent and contract fee will be charged as a penalty according to the refund policy. However, if the cancellation falls within the free cancellation period, a full refund will be issued.
reservations.refundNote2: Maintenance fees, cleaning fees, and deposits are fully refundable.
reservations.refundNote3: The refund policy may vary depending on the host's terms.

settings.aiAutoResponderDesc: When turned on, Snug AI will provide automated replies to guest messages on your behalf.

0.description: From reservations to guest support, minimize your management time across the entire process.

1.description: When you reduce hassle, revenue naturally increases.

2.description: Connect with long-term foreign resident demand and operate worry-free without vacancy concerns.

0.headline: Everything is unfamiliar since it's my first time.
0.body:
Looking up tutorials, creating manuals,
handling guests—I don't know where to start.

1.headline: I didn't expect operations to be this complicated.
1.body:
I'm always anxious because I have to double-check
everything myself, worried small mistakes could lead to big problems.

value.description: As operations get more complex, unnecessary costs increase and growth opportunities decrease. Snug simplifies the entire process, minimizing waste and maximizing efficiency, creating higher returns from the same space.

0.title: Foreign Guest Channels
0.description: We open up foreign customer acquisition channels for hosts who have space but lack connection methods.

1.title: Enhanced Foreign Matching
1.description: We stably connect long-term foreign demand that's difficult on other platforms.

2.title: Operations & CS Support
2.description: With 10 years of operational experience and multilingual CS, we help from real-time response to problem resolution.

3.title: Simplified Admin & Procedures
3.description: We simplify complex administrative terms and procedures to reduce confusion for foreigners.

dashboard.descriptionLine1: From house operations to sales, contracts, check-in status, and even refunds and cancellations!
dashboard.descriptionLine2: View and manage your entire operation at a glance from the host dashboard.

operations.label: House Operations Management
operations.descriptionLine1: Manage multiple vendors in one place with Snug.
operations.descriptionLine2: No more back-and-forth communication—request, accept, and record everything automatically with just one click.

eligibility.subtitleLine1: Anyone with a licensed accommodation or
eligibility.subtitleLine2: residential space available for 14+ day rentals can register.

section1.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
section1.content: These Terms of Service govern the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between Snug Lab Co., Ltd. (hereinafter "Company") and users regarding the use of Snug services (hereinafter "Service").

section2.title: Article 2 (Definitions)
section2.content: "Service" refers to the accommodation platform and related services provided by the Company. "User" refers to members and non-members who use the Service in accordance with these Terms. "Member" refers to a person who has registered with the Service and has been assigned an ID. "Host" refers to a member who registers and provides accommodations to guests through the Service. "Guest" refers to a member who books and uses accommodations through the Service.

section3.title: Article 3 (Provision of Services)
section3.content: The Company provides the following services: Accommodation search and booking services, mediation services between hosts and guests, payment processing services, customer support services, and other services determined by the Company. The Company may change the content of the Service to improve its quality, and will notify users of such changes in advance.

section4.title: Article 4 (Membership Registration)
section4.content: Membership registration is completed when the user agrees to these Terms, fills in the required information according to the registration form set by the Company, and the Company approves the application. The Company may refuse registration or restrict membership if: false information is provided, another person's information is used, or the registration requirements set by the Company are not met.

section5.title: Article 5 (User Obligations)
section5.content: Users shall not engage in the following activities: registration of false information, use of another person's information, interference with the Company's service operations, actions that damage the reputation of the Company or third parties, actions that violate laws or public order, and other actions that violate the usage rules set by the Company.

section6.title: Article 6 (Limitation of Liability)
section6.content: The Company only acts as an intermediary for transactions between hosts and guests, and does not guarantee the quality, safety, or legality of accommodations. The Company is not responsible for the inability to provide services due to force majeure events such as natural disasters, wars, or service interruptions by telecommunications providers.

section1.title: Article 1 (Personal Information Collected)
section1.content: The Company collects the following personal information to provide services: Required items - email address, password, name. Optional items - phone number, profile photo, passport number (for identity verification). Information automatically collected during service use - IP address, cookies, service usage records, visit history.

section2.title: Article 2 (Purpose of Collection and Use)
section2.content: The Company uses collected personal information for the following purposes: Service provision and operation, member management and identity verification, reservation and payment processing, customer inquiry response, service improvement and new service development, marketing and advertising (with optional consent).

section3.title: Article 3 (Retention Period)
section3.content: The Company destroys personal information without delay after the purpose of collection and use has been achieved. However, if preservation is required by relevant laws, it will be retained for the corresponding period: Records on contracts or withdrawal of subscriptions - 5 years, Records on payment and supply of goods - 5 years, Records on consumer complaints or dispute resolution - 3 years.

section4.title: Article 4 (Disclosure to Third Parties)
section4.content: In principle, the Company does not provide personal information to third parties without the user's consent. However, exceptions are made in the following cases: when the user has given prior consent, when required by law, when necessary for service provision (e.g., providing guest information to hosts when booking accommodations).

section5.title: Article 5 (Destruction of Personal Information)
section5.content: The Company destroys personal information without delay when it becomes unnecessary, such as after the retention period has passed or the processing purpose has been achieved. Information in electronic file format is securely deleted so that it cannot be recovered, and information recorded in paper documents is shredded or incinerated.

section6.title: Article 6 (User Rights)
section6.content: Users can view or modify their personal information at any time, and can request deletion of personal information by withdrawing their membership. Requests for viewing, correcting, deleting, or stopping the processing of personal information can be submitted through the customer center.

section7.title: Article 7 (Privacy Officer)
section7.content: The Company designates a Privacy Officer who is responsible for overseeing all personal information processing and handling user complaints and remedies related to personal information processing. Privacy Officer: cs@findsnug.com

section1.title: Data Deletion Policy
section1.content: Snug takes the protection of user personal information seriously. All users, including those with accounts created through Facebook or other social logins, can request deletion of their data at any time.

section2.title: How to Request Data Deletion
section2.step1: 1. Log in to your Snug account.
section2.step4: 4. Follow the instructions to complete account deletion.

section3.title: Data That Will Be Deleted
section3.content: When your account is deleted, the following data will be permanently removed: Profile information (name, email, profile photo), Booking history, Favorites list, Chat history, Payment information. However, some data may be retained for a certain period as required by law.

section4.title: Contact Us
section4.content: For inquiries about data deletion or to request deletion directly, please contact us at:
